text: Glumov's Diary () is a 1923 Soviet silent movie directed by Sergei Eisenstein.В Музее кино на ВДНХ открывается Кабинет Сергея ЭйзенштейнаДневник Глумова It stars Grigori Aleksandrov, Aleksandr Antonov, and Sergei Eisenstein. ==Actors== *Grigori Aleksandrov as Glumov/Golutvin *Aleksandr Antonov as Joffre *Sergei M. Eisenstein as Himself *Mikhail Gomorov as Turusina *Vera Muzykant as Mashenka/Mary McLack == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1923 movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Eisenstein
title: Glumov's Diary
